prompts: Create a plant-based Pokemon that thrives in forest environments, featuring vibrant green leaves.
Imagine a small, blue Pokemon with a round shape and large green foliage on top.
Generate a cute, nature-themed Pokemon with a playful personality and a round body.
Show me a whimsical Pokemon that resembles a flower, with a blue base and bright green accents.
Make a grass-type Pokemon with a unique leaf design that lives in grassy areas.
Design a quirky little Pokemon that loves sunlight and has a round blue body.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a forest with its leafy appearance.
